ftc.team6460.javadeck.api.peripheral

Interface SensorPeripheral<T,P>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Maintainable, RobotPeripheral
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EncoderedMotor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AntiStallFilter, MotorGearingFilter, ReadbackFilter, ServoFeedbackMotor

    public interface SensorPeripheral<T,P>
extends RobotPeripheral

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calibrate(T val, P params)
      Calibrates or resets the sensor.
      T read(P params)
      Reads the value from the sensor.

      • Methods inherited from interface ftc.team6460.javadeck.api.Maintainable

        loop, setup

    • Method Detail

      • read

        T read(P params)
throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
       PeripheralCommunicationException,
       PeripheralInoperableException
        Reads the value from the sensor.
        Parameters:
        params - Parameters, such as sensing type, to be passed to the sensor.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If interrupted waiting for the sensor to read its value.
        PeripheralCommunicationException - If the sensor cannot be communicated with.
        PeripheralInoperableException - If the sensor is inoperable.

      • calibrate

        void calibrate(T val,
               P params)
        throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
               java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException,
               PeripheralInoperableException,
               PeripheralCommunicationException
        Calibrates or resets the sensor.
        Parameters:
        params - Parameters, such as sensing type, to be passed to the sensor.
        val - The value to calibrate to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the sensor cannot be calibrated or set to that value.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If interrupted waiting for the sensor to read its value.
        PeripheralCommunicationException - If the sensor cannot be communicated with.
        PeripheralInoperableException - If the sensor is inoperable.
